name: Unnamed Project

entity_types.name: Economist
entity_types.description: Experts and analysts from financial institutions or think tanks who provide economic forecasts.

attributes.name: full_name
attributes.description: The full name of the economist

attributes.name: expertise_area
attributes.description: Specific field such as macroeconomics, labor markets, or geoeconomics

attributes.name: current_affiliation
attributes.description: The institution the economist represents

entity_types.name: CorporateExecutive
entity_types.description: High-level leaders in private companies making strategic decisions on workforce and technology.

attributes.name: full_name
attributes.description: The full name of the executive

attributes.name: company_name
attributes.description: The name of the company they lead

attributes.name: industry_sector
attributes.description: The industry cluster such as Automotive, Energy, or Finance

entity_types.name: TechProfessional
entity_types.description: Specialists in emerging technologies like AI, Big Data, and Robotics who drive innovation.

attributes.name: full_name
attributes.description: The full name of the professional

attributes.name: technical_specialization
attributes.description: Specific skill area like GenAI, Cybersecurity, or Fintech

attributes.name: professional_role
attributes.description: Current job title

entity_types.name: GovernmentOfficial
entity_types.description: Representatives of state agencies or regulatory bodies involved in trade and industrial policy.

attributes.name: full_name
attributes.description: The full name of the official

attributes.name: department_name
attributes.description: The government agency or ministry

attributes.name: policy_focus
attributes.description: Primary area of regulation such as anti-trust or trade

entity_types.name: AcademicResearcher
entity_types.description: Scholars and professors from universities providing research on future job trends and skills.

attributes.name: full_name
attributes.description: The full name of the researcher

attributes.name: university_affiliation
attributes.description: The higher education institution

attributes.name: research_topic
attributes.description: The specific area of study

entity_types.name: MediaOutlet
entity_types.description: Organizations that report on economic trends and disseminate information to the public.

attributes.name: org_name
attributes.description: The name of the media organization

attributes.name: media_type
attributes.description: Type of outlet such as digital news, TV, or financial journal

attributes.name: geographic_reach
attributes.description: The primary audience location

entity_types.name: EnvironmentalAdvocate
entity_types.description: Individuals or groups focused on the green transition and climate change adaptation.

attributes.name: full_name
attributes.description: The name of the advocate or spokesperson

attributes.name: cause_focus
attributes.description: Specific focus like decarbonization or renewable energy

entity_types.name: InternationalBody
entity_types.description: Multilateral organizations that facilitate global cooperation and standard setting.

attributes.name: org_name
attributes.description: The name of the international organization

attributes.name: mission_focus
attributes.description: The primary goal such as trade, labor, or economic stability

entity_types.name: Person
entity_types.description: Fallback type for any natural person not fitting specific categories, such as general workers.

attributes.name: full_name
attributes.description: The full name of the individual

attributes.name: personal_bio
attributes.description: A short description of the person

attributes.name: location_city
attributes.description: The city or country of residence

entity_types.name: Organization
entity_types.description: Fallback type for any group or entity not fitting specific categories, such as local NGOs.

attributes.name: org_name
attributes.description: The name of the organization

attributes.name: org_description
attributes.description: A brief description of the organization's purpose

edge_types.name: WORKS_FOR
edge_types.description: Indicates a person is employed by an organization.

edge_types.name: REPORTS_ON
edge_types.description: Indicates a media outlet or person is covering news or trends about an entity.

edge_types.name: ADVISES
edge_types.description: Indicates an expert provides guidance to a decision-making body.

edge_types.name: REGULATES
edge_types.description: Indicates a government or international body sets rules for an entity.

edge_types.name: SUPPORTS
edge_types.description: Indicates an entity publicly agrees with or promotes another entity's stance.

edge_types.name: OPPOSES
edge_types.description: Indicates an entity publicly disagrees with or challenges another entity.

edge_types.name: COLLABORATES_WITH
edge_types.description: Indicates two entities are working together on a project or report.

analysis_summary: The ontology is designed to simulate social media discourse surrounding the 'Future of Jobs Report 2025'. It focuses on key actors such as economists, tech professionals, and government officials who are central to discussions on AI, geoeconomics, and the green transition. The relationships reflect professional hierarchies, regulatory actions, and the spread of information through media, allowing for a realistic simulation of how different stakeholders react to global economic shifts.
simulation_requirement: analyze world economics and geopolitics in 2026
